dcterms:description: The Microsoft COCO dataset provided per-instance annotations (including bounding boxes and segmentations) to aid in precise object localization, with about 2.5 million labeled instances across 328k images. Images of 91 distinguishable categories were collected, of which 80 categories of their 2014 release are the most popular to be used in most research.
dcterms:title: COCO

dcterms:creator: Fengying Dang
Dong Chen
Yuzhen Lu
Zhaojian Li
dcterms:description: CottonWeedDet12 comprises 5,648 images of 12 weed species, which were collected. Three weed species of Purslane, Ragweed, and Palmer Amaranth, popular in Michigan and existing across the U.S., were chosen as targets.
dcterms:title: CottonWeedDet12
